item.title: High school roiled by allegation of racist, sexual hazing...
item.description:
apnews.com
DANVERS, Mass. (AP) — Teachers in Danvers are praising a student-athlete who came forward to detail violent, sexual, homophobic and racist hazing rituals in a high school hockey team locker room. Danvers High School has been roiled by the description of rituals where players disrobed and were fondled, something dubbed “Gay Tuesday,” and where players were roughed up if they didn’t shout a racial slur.

item.title: Board president kept sensitive personal information on protesting parents...
item.description:
www.foxnews.com
More than six hundred parents in Scottsdale, Arizona, are demanding the resignation of the school board president after a shocking revelation. The president or his father appears to have kept a dossier on 47 parents who dared to speak out against his policies at school board meetings – a dossier complete with Social Security numbers, background checks, divorce decrees, mortgage documents, trade certifications, and screenshots of Facebook posts.

item.description:

Scientists at Northwestern University reversed paralysis in mice with spinal cord injuries by injecting them with a self-assembling gel that can repair tissues.We don’t yet know if the findings, published in the journal Science, will translate over to humans.
